an10.170:1.3: katamanca, bhikkhave, orimam tiram, katamanca parimam tiram?
an10.170:1.4: Panatipato, bhikkhave, orimam tiram, panatipata veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.5: Adinnadanam orimam tiram, adinnadana veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.6: Kamesumicchacaro orimam tiram, kamesumicchacara veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.7: Musavado orimam tiram, musavada veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.8: Pisuna vaca orimam tiram, pisunaya vacaya veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.9: Pharusa vaca orimam tiram, pharusaya vacaya veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.10: Samphappalapo orimam tiram, samphappalapa veramani parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.11: Abhijjha orimam tiram, anabhijjha parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.12: Byapado orimam tiram, abyapado parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.13: Micchaditthi orimam tiram, sammaditthi parimam tiram.
an10.170:1.14: Idam kho, bhikkhave, orimam tiram, idam parimam tiranti.
